summary: This is an email exchange between Marc A. Weinstein and an unnamed recipient regarding scheduling a call for an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property. The email includes Weinstein's professional signature as a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Attorney, Partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: He initiates an email to schedule a call about an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property and is identified as a partner and chair of White Collar Defense at his law firm.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: He is copied on the email exchange about scheduling a call regarding Epstein's New York property.

connections.description: Both are included in email correspondence about Epstein's New York property, suggesting they are working together on legal matters related to Epstein.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein NY property
events.description: Marc A. Weinstein emails to schedule a call for an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property, with a proposed time between 1:00-1:45 PM.

locations: One Battery Park Plaza, 17th floor, New York, NY 10004-1482 (Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP office)
keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling a call for an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property in July 2020.
Marc A. Weinstein is identified as a partner and chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP.
Andrew Tomback is copied on the email, indicating his involvement in matters related to Epstein's property.
The correspondence occurs nearly a year after Epstein's death in August 2019, suggesting ongoing legal or administrative matters related to his estate.
The email includes a standard confidentiality disclaimer, indicating the sensitive nature of the discussion.
